channel.title: [PI] Money Orb Save
channel.description: I decided to add a money orb to my servs client and its working just fine. You can add to pouch and withdraw without flaw but then when you log out, the money is gone. The Orb does not save the money added. I have checked and went over my codes and compared to the tut and I cannot find the error. I clearly messed up somewhere but I can't find it. Any ideas on where this problem might be located?

item.title: [PI] Money Orb Save
item.dc:creator: @igli igli
item.description:
@igli wrote:

I believe so. This is what I have:

} else if (token.equals("MoneyOrb")) { p.MoneyCash = Integer.parseInt(token2);

characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("MoneyOrb = ", 0, 11); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.MoneyCash), 0, Integer.toString(p.MoneyCash).length()); characterfile.newLine();
